glassSkin.name: Glass Skin
glassSkin.description: Achieve that coveted translucent, poreless glow with intense hydration and luminosity

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.purpose: Remove overnight buildup and prep skin

steps.name: Hydration Booster
steps.purpose: Instantly plump and prep for absorption
steps.howTo: Apply 2-3 drops to clean, damp skin. Gently pat in with fingertips, allowing full absorption before next step. Can layer 2-3 times for extra hydration.

steps.name: Brightening Step
steps.purpose: Enhance radiance and even tone
steps.howTo: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin, gently pat in with fingertips, wait 1-2 minutes before next step. Use vitamin C in AM, niacinamide can be used AM or PM.

steps.name: Moisturizer
steps.purpose: Lock in hydration and create smooth base

steps.name: Protect
steps.purpose: Shield from UV damage and maintain glow
steps.howTo: Apply generous amount (1/4 teaspoon) to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours or after sweating/swimming.

steps.name: Exfoliant
steps.purpose: Remove dead skin cells for smoother texture
steps.howTo: Apply thin layer to clean skin 2-3x per week initially, gradually increase frequency. Avoid eye area. Always follow with moisturizer and use SPF next day.

steps.name: Barrier Repair
steps.purpose: Strengthen skin barrier overnight

steps.name: Moisturizer
steps.purpose: Seal in all treatments for overnight repair
steps.productType: rich night moisturizer or sleeping mask

clearSkin.name: Clear Skin
clearSkin.description: Target acne and blemishes while maintaining balanced, healthy skin

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.purpose: Remove excess oil without over-drying
steps.productType: salicylic acid or gentle foaming cleanser

steps.name: Soothing Serum
steps.purpose: Calm inflammation and redness
steps.howTo: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin, gently pat in with fingertips. Can be used morning and evening. Start with once daily if new to niacinamide.

steps.name: Spot Treatment
steps.purpose: Target active breakouts directly
steps.productType: benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid spot treatment
steps.howTo: Apply small amount directly to active blemishes only. Start with every other night to build tolerance. Avoid over-application to prevent irritation.

steps.name: Moisturizer
steps.purpose: Hydrate without clogging pores

steps.name: Protect
steps.purpose: Prevent post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation
steps.howTo: Apply generous amount (1/4 teaspoon) to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours or after sweating/swimming.

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.purpose: Remove excess oil without over-drying
steps.productType: salicylic acid or gentle foaming cleanser

steps.name: Pore-Clearing Toner
steps.purpose: Unclog pores and prevent breakouts

steps.name: Moisturizer
steps.purpose: Maintain skin barrier overnight

porcelainSkin.name: Porcelain Skin
porcelainSkin.description: Achieve perfectly even, smooth complexion with refined texture and luminous clarity

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.purpose: Gently cleanse without disrupting skin tone

steps.name: Brightening Step
steps.purpose: Even skin tone, fade dark spots, and calm skin in one step
steps.howTo: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin, gently pat in with fingertips. Use in the AM only.

steps.name: Soothing Serum
steps.purpose: Calm inflammation and redness
steps.howTo: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin, gently pat in with fingertips. Can be used morning and evening. Start with once daily if new to niacinamide.

steps.name: Moisturizer
steps.purpose: Smooth texture, support barrier, and maintain hydration

steps.name: Protect
steps.purpose: Prevent new dark spots and maintain clarity
steps.productType: zinc oxide SPF with slight tint
steps.howTo: Apply generous amount (1/4 teaspoon) to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours or after sweating/swimming.

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.purpose: Gently cleanse without disrupting skin tone

steps.name: Exfoliator
steps.purpose: Gently refine texture and enhance product absorption
steps.productType: gentle AHA (lactic acid or mandelic acid) exfoliant
steps.howTo: Apply thin layer to clean skin 2-3x per week initially, gradually increase frequency. Avoid eye area. Always follow with moisturizer and use SPF next day.

steps.name: Moisturizer
steps.purpose: Seal in treatment and repair skin barrier overnight

honeySkin.name: Honey Skin
honeySkin.description: Create supple, bouncy skin with a natural healthy glow and plump texture through layered hydration and barrier support

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.purpose: Gently cleanse without stripping natural moisture
steps.productType: low pH gel or cream cleanser with hydrating agents
steps.howTo: Massage onto damp skin for 30–60 seconds, rinse with lukewarm water.

steps.name: Hydrating Essence/Toner
steps.purpose: Deliver deep hydration and prep skin for layering
steps.productType: essence or toner with hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and beta-glucan
steps.howTo: Pat onto skin after cleansing. Use 2–3 layers if skin is dehydrated.

steps.name: Propolis + Antioxidant Serum
steps.purpose: Boost glow, fight free radicals, and enhance skin bounce
steps.productType: serum with propolis extract, honey extract, vitamin E, or niacinamide
steps.howTo: Apply 2–3 drops to face and neck, pat in gently.

steps.name: Moisturizer
steps.purpose: Seal hydration, support elasticity, and add cushion
steps.productType: ceramide-rich cream or emulsion with squalane
steps.howTo: Apply evenly to face and neck, press gently for absorption.

steps.name: Protect
steps.purpose: Prevent UV damage and maintain glow
steps.productType: broad-spectrum SPF 30+ with a dewy finish
steps.howTo: Apply ~1/4 teaspoon to face/neck 15 minutes before sun. Reapply every 2 hours.

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.purpose: Remove makeup, SPF, and impurities without stripping skin
steps.productType: cream cleanser or double cleanse (oil + gel)
steps.howTo: Massage onto skin, emulsify with water, rinse thoroughly.

steps.name: Barrier Repair Serum
steps.purpose: Rebuild skin barrier and improve elasticity overnight
steps.productType: serum with ceramides, peptides, and honey/propolis
steps.howTo: Apply evenly to face and neck, pat gently.

steps.name: Exfoliate
steps.purpose: Gently smooth texture without disrupting hydration
steps.howTo: Use 1–2x/week instead of essence, always follow with moisturizer.

dry.howTo:
Apply cleanser to dry skin with fingertips
Massage gently for 30-60 seconds
Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry
dry.whyEffective: Contains ceramides and hyaluronic acid that cleanse while maintaining the skin's natural moisture barrier.

normal.productName: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Cleanser
normal.howTo:
Apply to damp skin and work into light lather
Massage for 30 seconds focusing on entire face
Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water
normal.whyEffective: Formulated with niacinamide and ceramides to cleanse effectively while maintaining skin balance and reducing irritation.

oily.howTo:
Apply to wet skin and work into rich foam
Massage for 45 seconds focusing on T-zone
Rinse thoroughly and use twice daily
oily.whyEffective: Oil-based formula effectively dissolves excess sebum and makeup while being gentle enough for daily use.

combination.howTo:
Apply to damp skin and create light foam
Massage gently for 30 seconds, focus on T-zone
Rinse well with lukewarm water
combination.whyEffective: Polyhydroxy acid gently exfoliates while being sulfate-free, making it perfect for balancing combination skin needs.

dry.howTo:
Apply generous amount to clean face and neck
Massage in upward circular motions
Allow full absorption before next step
dry.whyEffective: Formulated with ceramides and hyaluronic acid to restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier while providing long-lasting hydration.

normal.howTo:
Apply moderate amount to face and neck
Pat and massage gently until absorbed
Adjust amount based on seasonal needs
normal.whyEffective: Contains hyaluronic acid that holds up to 1000 times its weight in water, providing optimal hydration without heaviness.

oily.productName: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Moisturizer
oily.howTo:
Apply thin layer to face and neck
Pat gently until absorbed, avoid T-zone
Use morning and evening after treatments
oily.whyEffective: Oil-free formula with niacinamide and ceramides provides essential hydration while controlling excess oil production.

combination.productName: Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Moisturizer
combination.howTo:
Apply more product to dry cheek areas
Use lighter amount on oily T-zone
Pat gently until absorbed, adjust as needed
combination.whyEffective: Lightweight gel-lotion hybrid with oat extract balances hydration needs of both dry and oily areas effectively.

dry.howTo:
Apply generous amount after serums
Massage gently until absorbed
Use nightly for intensive barrier repair
dry.whyEffective: Contains petrolatum, ceramides, and hyaluronic acid to create a protective barrier while repairing damaged skin.

normal.howTo:
Apply moderate amount after serums
Pat and massage until fully absorbed
Use 4-5x per week or as needed
normal.whyEffective: Peptides stimulate collagen production while strengthening the skin barrier and reducing signs of aging.

oily.howTo:
Apply thin layer as final PM step
Pat gently until absorbed
Use 3-4x per week to avoid over-moisturizing
oily.whyEffective: Lightweight gel formula delivers intensive overnight hydration and barrier repair without clogging pores.

combination.howTo:
Apply more to dry cheek areas
 Use lighter amount on T-zone
Pat gently and use 4-5x per week
combination.whyEffective: Ceramide-rich formula balances different skin zones while strengthening the overall barrier function.

dry.howTo:
Apply thin layer to clean skin PM only
Start 2-3x per week, avoid eye area
Always follow with moisturizer and SPF next day
dry.whyEffective: Lactic acid gently exfoliates dead skin cells while hyaluronic acid provides hydration, making it ideal for sensitive skin.

normal.howTo:
Apply with cotton pad to clean skin
Start 2-3x per week, gradually increase
Use PM only, always follow with SPF next day
normal.whyEffective: Betaine salicylate (gentler BHA) unclogs pores and refines texture while niacinamide soothes and hydrates.

oily.productName: Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant
oily.howTo:
Apply with cotton pad PM only
Start 3x per week, build tolerance
Focus on pore-prone areas and T-zone
oily.whyEffective: Salicylic acid penetrates deep into pores to dissolve oil and debris while being gentle enough for daily use.

combination.howTo:
Apply with cotton pad 3-4x per week
Focus on T-zone, avoid dry cheek areas
Use PM only with hydrating base
combination.whyEffective: Betaine salicylate provides gentler exfoliation than salicylic acid while niacinamide balances different skin zones.

all.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean, damp skin
Gently pat in with fingertips
Layer 2-3 times for extra hydration if needed
all.whyEffective: Hyaluronic acid holds up to 1000 times its weight in water, providing intense hydration while vitamin B5 soothes skin.

all.productName: CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum
all.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin
Gently pat in with fingertips
Wait 1-2 minutes before next step, use AM only
all.whyEffective: Vitamin C brightens skin and fades dark spots while hyaluronic acid provides hydration and ceramides strengthen the barrier.

all.howTo:
Apply generous amount (1/4 teaspoon) to face and neck
Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure
Reapply every 2 hours or after sweating
all.whyEffective: Zinc oxide and titanium dioxide provide broad-spectrum protection while ceramides and hyaluronic acid hydrate skin.

all.howTo:
Apply small amount directly to active blemishes
Start every other night to build tolerance
Use PM only to avoid sun sensitivity
all.whyEffective: Benzoyl peroxide kills acne-causing bacteria and reduces inflammation while micronized formula minimizes irritation.

all.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin
Gently pat in with fingertips
Start once daily, can use AM and PM
all.whyEffective: Niacinamide reduces inflammation and controls oil production while zinc provides additional antimicrobial benefits.

all.howTo:
Pat onto skin after cleansing
Use 2–3 layers if skin is dehydrated
Allow each layer to fully absorb
all.whyEffective: Hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5 provide deep hydration while preparing skin for better absorption of subsequent products.

all.howTo:
Apply 2–3 drops to face and neck
Pat in gently with fingertips
Layer thinnest to thickest consistency
all.whyEffective: Propolis provides antioxidant protection while niacinamide reduces inflammation and controls oil for a healthy glow.

all.productName: Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant
all.howTo:
Apply with cotton pad PM only
Start 3x per week, build tolerance
Focus on pore-prone areas
all.whyEffective: Salicylic acid penetrates deep into pores to dissolve oil and dead skin cells while being gentle enough for regular use.

breakoutDetection.description: When breakouts are detected above threshold, use breakout-specific products

brightening treatment.name: Face Reality Sal‑C Toner (BHA + Vitamin C)
brightening treatment.purpose: Clear breakouts while brightening skin tone
brightening treatment.howTo: Apply with cotton pad morning and evening after cleansing. Start 3x per week, gradually increase frequency. Avoid eye area.

metadata.description: Dream skin templates for personalized skincare routine recommendations with conditional product logic
